about_the_game:
Core gameplay:

Players will play as a cultivator, constantly exploring caves or dangerous places on this shattered land. Every time you delve into the unknown, you face severe challenges. You need to collect ancient treasures scattered everywhere and cleverly utilize the limited divine space to inspire these treasures. Each treasure has unique attributes and abilities, such as flying swords that can capture enemy heads from thousands of miles away, techniques that record powerful sword skills, and battle armor that protect oneself from invasion

Construction and Combat:

By collecting treasures, players can build their own builds - equipment combinations - and create various combat styles based on different treasures. You can choose to become a glass cannon that abandons all defenses, or a bulletproof iron barrel that uses strategy to make enemies kneel and beg for mercy. Every decision is crucial because your goal is to survive and overcome all impossibilities in this challenging world.

Freedom and Strategy:

The game emphasizes free strategy, where players can adjust their builds according to their personal preferences and current situation. There is no fixed path to victory, only the tactics that are most suitable for the current environment and personal style. Whether it's a tough front or a roundabout tactic, everything depends on your decision.

name: Starfall: Inferno of Worlds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c

short_description: Are you ready to embrace the challenge? In "Starfall: Inferno of Worlds" you will experience an adventure like never before, crafting your own legendary tale!
